name: 秦先玉
objective: 本課程將以幾波全球化為背景，首先指出性別與科技如何相互建構，接者分析機器與男性氣質的關聯性。以此為基礎，帶領同學認識性別與交織分析如何解決科技研究的盲點，最後反思工程文化的性別議題。The course will be contextualized within several waves of globalization. It will start by examining how gender and technology mutually construct each other, followed by an analysis of the correlation between machinery and masculine traits. Building upon this foundation, it will guide students to understand how gender and intersectional analysis address blind spots in technological research. Finally, it will encourage reflection on gender issues within engineering culture.
